SEARCH
Module com.example.softmethproject4

Package com.example.softmethproject4

package com.example.softmethproject4
  • Class
    Description
    BBQChicken
    This class defines a BBQChicken Pizza that will be part of an order.
    BuildYourOwn
    This class defines a Build Your Own Pizza that will be part of an order.
    ChicagoPizza
    This class defines a pizza of Chicago Style, and it implements the PizzaFactory interface.
    CHIStyleController
    This class defines the Controller for the CHIStyleView and also defines all attributes and elements on the CHIStyleView, as well as the methods behind each ActionEvent that occurs on that view and connects to the backend program.
    Crust
    This enum class defines the six different Crusts that a pizza can have, determined based on what style and flavor of pizza is chosen by the user.
    CurrentOrderController
    This class defines the controller for the CurrentOrderView.
    Customizable
    This interface defines the add() and remove() that will be used to add or remove toppings to pizzas as well as add or remove pizzas from an order.
    Deluxe
    This class defines a Deluxe Pizza that will be part of an order.
    MainController
    This class defines the Controller for the MainView, as well as all elements and attributes of the MainView and also the methods that are invoked based on user inputted Action Events in the MainView.
    Meatzza
    This class defines a Meatzza Pizza that will be part of an order.
    NYPizza
    This class defines a pizza of New York Style, and it implements the PizzaFactory interface.
    NYStyleController
    This class defines the Controller for the NYStyleView and also defines all attributes and elements on the NYStyleView, as well as the methods behind each ActionEvent that occurs on that view and connects to the backend program.
    Order
    This class is an implementation of the Customizable interface and defines an Order object.
    Pizza
    This class is an implementation of the Customizable interface and defines a Pizza object.
    PizzaFactory
    This interface defines the createDeluxe(), createMeatzza(), createBBQChicken(), and createBuildYourOwn() methods that will be used to create pizzas of different flavors dependent on which style of pizza is chosen by the user.
    RUPizzeriaApplication
    This class launches the MainView and starts the RU Pizzeria application which the user can interact with.
    Size
    This enum class defines the three different Sizes that a pizza can have, defined by the prices of each different flavor of pizza.
    StoreOrder
    This class is an implementation of the Customizable interface and defines a StoreOrder object.
    Topping
    This enum class defines the thirteen different Toppings that a pizza can have, defined by the price of each different Topping.
